tool_input.content:
# Configuration Override for Terraform Projects
# Copy this to your project as .langgraph/config/gates.yaml

extends: "~/.claude/langgraph/config/default_gates.yaml"

# Project-specific settings
project:
  type: "terraform"
  language: "hcl"

  # Terraform directory structure
  source_directories:
    - "modules/"
    - "environments/"
    - "*.tf"         # Root terraform files

  test_directories:
    - "tests/"
    - "test/"
    - "examples/"

  # Testing tool
  coverage_tool: "terratest"  # or "terraform-compliance"

# Gate configuration
gates:
  gate_2_coverage:
    enabled: true
    threshold: 100
    # Terraform specific testing
    coverage_command: "go test -v ./tests/..."  # If using Terratest
    # Alternative: "terraform-compliance -f tests/ -p ."

  gate_3_mock:
    enabled: false  # Not applicable to Terraform

  gate_5_security:
    enabled: true
    # Terraform security tools
    scan_tools:
      - "tfsec"           # Terraform security scanner
      - "checkov"         # Policy-as-code scanner
      - "terrascan"       # Infrastructure security scanner
    coverage_command: "tfsec . && checkov -d ."

# Specialist agents
specialist_agents:
  gate_2_coverage: "cloud-architect"
  gate_5_security: "cloud-security-specialist"
  gate_6_production_ready: "devops-engineer"
